Class Building

java.lang.Object
objects.GameObject
objects.Buildings.Building
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrowTower, BombTower, CannonTower, Door, GoldMine, GoldStash, Harvester, MageTower, MeleeTower, SlowTrap, Wall
public abstract class Building extends GameObject

  • Constructor Details

    • Building

      public Building(double x, double y, int width, int height, String name, String iconName)
      Constructor for Building Precondition: width and height are positive integers Postcondition: Building is created
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the building
      y - the y-coordinate of the building
      width - the width of the building
      height - the height of the building
      name - the name of the building
      iconName - the filename of the building's icon image

  • Method Details

    • loadSprites

      protected void loadSprites(String name, boolean hasMiddle, boolean hasHead, boolean hasClaw, String projectileName)
      Loads the sprites for the Building Precondition: N/A Postcondition: sprites are loaded for the Building at all levels
      Parameters:
      name - the base name of the building sprites
      hasMiddle - whether the building has middle sprites
      hasHead - whether the building has head/top sprites
      hasClaw - whether the building has claw/other sprites
      projectileName - the filename of the projectile sprite, or null if building doesn't shoot
